headline: Chevron's Free Cash Flow Rises - An Expected Dividend Hike Could Push CVX 14% Higher
summary: Chevron reported a 52% rise in Q3 adjusted free cash flow - more than covering its dividend and buybacks. This implies that if Chevron raises its dividend by 5%, CVX stock may be worth $171 per share, up +10%.

raw.headline: Chevron's Free Cash Flow Rises - An Expected Dividend Hike Could Push CVX 14% Higher

headline: Timor-Leste's ANP Opens ADIPEC 2025 with Strategic Meetings and Growing Global Interest
summary: London, United Kingdom--(Newsfile Corp. - November 3, 2025) - The Autoridade Nacional do Petróleo (ANP) of Timor-Leste began its participation at ADIPEC 2025 with a day of high-level meetings and strong engagement from the international energy community.Representing Asia's newest ASEAN member nation, the ANP delegation, composed of nearly 15 senior executives, held productive discussions with major global players, including CNPC, Shell, Mubadala, Oxy, Chevron, ExxonMobil, XRG, and Dragon Oil....

headline: Grace Acquires Advanced Refining Technologies, Deepens Commitment to Refining Industry
summary: W. R. Grace & Co. (Grace), a leading global supplier of specialty chemicals and solutions that enable industries to enhance modern life, today announced it has acquired Chevron U.S.A. Inc.'s (Chevron) interest in Advanced Refining Technologies (ART or ART Hydroprocessing™), a joint venture between Grace and Chevron and a premier provider of refining catalysts that produce lower carbon intensity fuels.

raw.headline: Grace Acquires Advanced Refining Technologies, Deepens Commitment to Refining Industry
raw.summary: W. R. Grace & Co. (Grace), a leading global supplier of specialty chemicals and solutions that enable industries to enhance modern life, today announced it has acquired Chevron U.S.A. Inc.'s (Chevron) interest in Advanced Refining Technologies (ART or ART Hydroprocessing™), a joint venture between Grace and Chevron and a premier provider of refining catalysts that produce lower carbon intensity fuels.

headline: Chevron Lummus Global Expands and Strengthens Catalyst Portfolio
summary: Chevron Lummus Global (CLG) announced an agreement that will enhance CLG's catalyst business by reshaping how it develops, sells and supports a portion of the Advanced Refining Technologies (ART or ART Hydroprocessing™) catalyst portfolio. A premier provider of refining catalysts that produce lower carbon intensity fuels, ART is a joint venture between W.R. Grace & Co. (Grace) and Chevron U.S.A. Inc. (Chevron).

raw.headline: Chevron Lummus Global Expands and Strengthens Catalyst Portfolio
raw.summary: Chevron Lummus Global (CLG) announced an agreement that will enhance CLG's catalyst business by reshaping how it develops, sells and supports a portion of the Advanced Refining Technologies (ART or ART Hydroprocessing™) catalyst portfolio. A premier provider of refining catalysts that produce lower carbon intensity fuels, ART is a joint venture between W.R. Grace & Co. (Grace) and Chevron U.S.A. Inc. (Chevron).

headline: Chevron Announces Leadership Changes
summary: HOUSTON, November 03, 2025--Chevron Corporation (NYSE: CVX) announced today the appointment of Amit R. Ghai as Controller of Chevron, effective March 1, 2026. Ghai will succeed Alana K. Knowles, in anticipation of her expected retirement from Chevron in April 2026, after 38 years of service.

raw.headline: Chevron Announces Leadership Changes
raw.summary: HOUSTON, November 03, 2025--Chevron Corporation (NYSE: CVX) announced today the appointment of Amit R. Ghai as Controller of Chevron, effective March 1, 2026. Ghai will succeed Alana K.
